original_title: 封印映像27 結婚呪い コープスブライド
overview: The video of the TV program that had a problem during the shooting and was stored. A voyeur video that was supposed to be sold for maniacs. A number of spirits, strangeness, cruelty, crime, madness were projected there. And some of the people involved are said to have died of strange phenomena, missing and strange deaths ...
title: Sealed Video 27: Marriage Curse Corpse Bride
